## Source: ossf-package-analysis (52a55ac73cfe94f23310de107d74ba82bfa2e8ae17f9742af50ef4e2da42c98d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'microsoft.applicationinsights.windowsapps' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
